data.eml:eml: Halacarus socius (Acari: Halacaridae), description of the male and diagnoses of species of the Halacarus actenos group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bartsch, Ilse (2011): Halacarus socius (Acari: Halacaridae), description of the male and diagnoses of species of the Halacarus actenos group. Zootaxa 2800: 18-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277043
